experiences.title: Code Mentor
experiences.description: Teaching programming fundamentals to underserved youth and helping bridge the digital divide through technology education.

experiences.title: Open Source Contributor
experiences.description: Contributing to open source projects including React, Vue ecosystem, and developer tools used by thousands of developers worldwide.

experiences.title: Tech for Good
experiences.description: Building websites and digital solutions for local non-profit organizations to help them reach more people and amplify their impact.

experiences.title: Workshop Leader
experiences.description: Organizing and leading web development workshops for beginners, helping them start their coding journey with hands-on projects.
